TypeSignature.Value: public delegate object PropertyValueMorphHelper(ModelItem originalValue, ModelProperty newModelProperty);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyValueMorphHelper extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function PropertyValueMorphHelper(originalValue As ModelItem, newModelProperty As ModelProperty) As Object
public delegate System::Object ^ PropertyValueMorphHelper(ModelItem ^ originalValue, ModelProperty ^ newModelProperty);

param.name: originalValue
param.span: 要轉換成新型別的模型項目屬性值。

span.span: The model item property value to convert to the new type.

param.name: newModelProperty
param.span: 模型項目屬性；originalValue 需要轉換成這個屬性的類型。

span.span: The model item property whose type the originalValue needs to be converted to.

summary.span: 代表委派，這個委派會用來參考處理 屬性值之型別轉換的方法。

span.span: Represents a delegate that is used to reference the method that handles type conversions for property values.
